title: AI Course Builder Platform
description: A web app that generates structured learning paths from any topic you enter. It creates an AI-generated course outline, fetches YouTube video lectures for each module, and gives quick reference links—all in one place.

title: MP3 Audio Summarizer
description: A Streamlit web app that summarizes MP3 Audios by extracting transcripts and generating concise summaries using AI models like Google's Gemini.

title: Cafe Management System
description: The Café Management System is a sleek web app designed to manage daily café operations with ease. It lets users track orders, manage customers, and update menu items — all from a clean, intuitive dashboard. Built for speed and simplicity, it's ideal for small café businesses seeking a digital upgrade.
